title: Clear 'NO JOB ID PROVIDED' and 'EXPECTED V3 RESPONSE' error messages from UI

requirements.summary: Remove or suppress the 'NO JOB ID PROVIDED' error message from the Results page UI, redirecting silently or showing a neutral fallback state when no job ID is present
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'NO JOB ID PROVIDED' does not appear anywhere in the rendered UI
When no job ID is present in the route/URL, the user is redirected or shown a neutral fallback (e.g., back to home) without displaying the raw error string

file_operations.description: Replace the 'NO JOB ID PROVIDED' error display with silent redirect to home page or a neutral fallback message. Add early validation for missing job ID in the URL params and handle it gracefully without showing the raw error string to users.

requirements.summary: Remove or suppress the 'EXPECTED V3 RESPONSE' error message from the UI, replacing any occurrence with neutral fallback handling
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'EXPECTED V3 RESPONSE' does not appear anywhere in the rendered UI
Any code path that previously surfaced this string either silently handles the condition or shows a user-friendly generic error message

file_operations.description: Find and replace any display of 'EXPECTED V3 RESPONSE' error string with either silent error handling or a user-friendly generic error message (e.g., 'Unable to load results'). Ensure the internal error string is never surfaced to the user interface.
